= Introduction =

This page tells you how to compile DS Paint.


= Windows =
N/A

= Linux =
Make sure you have followed the instructions in [http://code.google.com/p/dspaint/wiki/EnvironmentSetup EnvironmentSetup] before beginning. The steps are as follows:
  # Get the latest SVN source
  # Navigate to the root folder of dspaint using the terminal
  # Type 'make clean'
  # Type 'make'

A DSPaint.nds should appear in the root folder of dspaint which is now ready to use.
